title: If I lived in Alabama, I know who I’d vote for
author: VD
content_html:
“I REFUSE TO GIVE THE STATE POWER OVER MY PANTIES!!!”

All the regulars are familiar with my skeptical view with regards to women in politics, but this lady running for governor on the Libertarian ticket appears to be a serious exception to the rule.
